SELECT * FROM product JOIN file ON pd_num = fi_table_key
JOIN wishitem ON product.pd_num = wishitem.wi_pd_num
WHERE fi_category = "게시글 썸네일" AND pd_pc_num = #{pd_pc_num} and fi_table="product"
and (pd_title like concat("%",#{cri.search},"%") or pd_content like concat("%",#{cri.search},"%") or pd_street_address like concat("%",#{cri.search},"%") or pd_registerd_address like concat("%",#{cri.search},"%"))
ORDER BY pd_viewcount DESC
GROUP BY product.pd_num ORDER BY COUNT(wi_num) DESC
limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
select coalesce(count(*), 0) from wishitem where wi_pd_num=#{pd_num}

SELECT pd_title,pd_num, pd_fe_start,pd_fe_end FROM product WHERE pd_pc_num = 4
and (pd_fe_start = CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}, '-', #{day}) OR LAST_DAY(CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}, '-', #{day})) = pd_fe_end)
and (pd_fe_start = CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}, '-0', #{day}) OR LAST_DAY(CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}, '-0', #{day})) = pd_fe_end)
